#################################################

How to install:
1. Run Tradewinds Odyssey_setup.exe
2. Install by following the on-screen instructions.
3. Play!

#################################################

About the game:

Tradewinds Odyssey, the latest installment in the immensely popular Tradewinds series, takes you on a journey of epic proportions. Guide five unique heroes - the Athlete, Cynic, Priestess, Minotaur and Goddess - through 50 chapters and quests, encountering characters both strange and familiar. Trade like never before by creating and spreading goods to new lands as you build, strengthen and upgrade your fleet into a powerful force unrivaled in the Aegean! Cast powerful spells bestowed upon you by the gods, or use your unique Hero's Talent to demolish your opponent in battle. Start your adventure today, in Tradewinds Odyssey!
